Author: Tichy
Content: So many companies out there seem to have really crappy products, therefore I am convinced that you can be successful with anything. It just takes the right kind of sticking to it.

Author: Tichy
Content: Just curious, what else than Java would you use for performance, save for C or Lisp? I know the YC folks don't appreciate it, but actually Java has it's merits. Last comparison I looked at, Java was 6 times slower than C, with only LISP being faster and not being C. Scripting languages like Python or Perl are a factor slower than Java.
